short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension saves all open tabs to a Linkplotter collection. For more information, visit https://www.linkplotter.com/

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to LinkPlotter, a smart and innovative Chrome extension designed to streamline your browsing experience. Say goodbye to the days of cluttered tabs and the frustration of lost links. LinkPlotter offers an ingenious solution to manage, save, and organize your browser tabs into meaningful collections.

🔒 Please Note: A FREE account on LinkPlotter.com is required to use this extension. You can create your account within a few easy steps and start managing your tabs right away!

With just a simple click, LinkPlotter lets you save all your open tabs into an existing collection or even a new one. Working on a research project or just gathering some holiday ideas? LinkPlotter lets you categorize these links efficiently for easy access later.

Key Features:

Easy Tab Management 💾: Save all your open tabs with a single click, de-clutter your browser, and make your browsing experience more efficient.

Collection Creation 🗂️: Group your saved tabs into meaningful collections. You can add tabs into an existing collection or create a new one with a custom title.

Secure Sync ☁️: All your collections are safely stored and synced with your LinkPlotter account. You can access them from any device at any time.

Shareable Collections 🔄: Have some interesting links to share? Simply publish your collections and share them with your friends, family, or colleagues.

Simple UI 🎨: With its user-friendly interface, managing your tabs has never been easier. Plus, LinkPlotter's clean, sleek look integrates smoothly with your browser.

Immerse yourself in a smoother, more organized web surfing experience with LinkPlotter. Install now and redefine the way you manage tabs and links. Happy browsing! 🏄‍♂️🎉
